title: HOUR 1 - NBA, Saban, Irving
itunes:title: HOUR 1 - NBA, Saban, Irving
description:
The NBA is facing a huge problem and it centers around Kevin Durant

Nick Saban's comments on realignment

Kyrie Irving is realizing his options are limited

Rasheed Wallace wouldn't be better than Giannis Antetokounmpo if he played today

 

Guest: Ric Bucher

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
